refnamediv.refpurpose: Evaluates arguments as a shell command

refsynopsisdiv.para: The eval command parses its arguments, concatenates them with spaces then passes the resultant string to the current Shell for evaluation and execution. This command can be used to dynamically construct and execute commands.

refsection.title: Return Value
refsection.para: Returns 0 if the command executed successfully, 1 if there was an error.
